title: DeFi like never before
subtitle: We are experiencing a community effort to design the most efficient UX that users and Dapps can leverage to take the best out of DeFi.

sections.title: Composable Leverage
sections.text: Don't get limited to leverage trading, get until 12x exposure to a currency and use it accross the DeFi Landscape!

sections.title: Social-Fi
sections.text: Copy most performing strategy in on-click, you can also delegate the management to a strategist without paying any additional fees while keeping the custody of your assets. Become strategist and earn a portion of platform fees based of the volume of your followers.

sections.title: Flexible Management
sections.text: You can manage manually your holdings from our intuitive interface or use our SDK to build high frequencies trading strategies. Export your strategy or import chad ones.
